message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product. For its exceptional value and quality, I believe it's worth $95. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and quality.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product. In light of our discussion, I am willing to consider $87 as the price for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $82. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. Considering our previous discussions and your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $84 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can finalize the transaction.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $81. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I believe this price is fair considering the value you're offering.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your efforts to stay within your budget. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at a price of $82.50. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests, and I hope it will enable us to conclude this transaction satisfactorily.
